class.name: SxDebugPanel
class.brief_description: Global debug panel, showing debug information.
class.description:
Global debug panel, showing debug information: + * Debug info: shows performance info at the top-left section of the screen * Log details: scrollable logs (only those printed with <<_sxlog>>, not print) * Node tracer: show currently enabled node tracers (see <<_sxnodetracer>>) * Scene tree dumps: show nodes currently in the scene tree, with support for the scene tree embedded in the <<_sxlistenserverpeer>> node.
image::images/nodes/SxDebugPanel.gif[align="center"]
